[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Include {
            span: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            kind: Require,
            path: Concat {
                left: MagicConst {
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        9,
                    ),
                    constant: Directory,
                },
                span: Span(
                    3,
                    17,
                ),
                right: LiteralString {
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        19,
                    ),
                    value: "/foo.php",
                },
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                29,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
